title: Copy Task configuration
description: Defines the static assets which should be copied as a build step

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

copyTo.description: A mapping of destination folders to a list of files to get copied

^[a-zA-Z0-9_@/-]+$.description: A list of paths to the source files which get copied

shouldFlatten.description: An optional property that indicates whether to keep the directory structure intact. By default it copies all files to the same directory level
